org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.script

Class EvalScriptEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.script.EvalScriptEngine

  • public class EvalScriptEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Load and process configuration files. Also provides helper methods used by the configuration scripts to locate & invoke methods.
    Since:
    0.10

      • runScript

        @Nullable
public java.lang.Object runScript(EvalScript script,
                                  EvalProject project)
                           throws TaskExecutionException
        Run an evaluation config script and get the evaluations it produces.
        Parameters:
        script - The script to run (as loaded by Groovy)
        project - The project to run the script on.
        Returns:
        The return value of the script.
        Throws:
        TaskExecutionException - if the script is invalid or produces an error.

      • loadProject

        public EvalProject loadProject(java.io.File file)
                        throws TaskExecutionException,
                               java.io.IOException
        Load a set of evaluations from a script file.
        Parameters:
        file - A Groovy script to configure the evaluator.
        Returns:
        A list of evaluations to run.
        Throws:
        TaskExecutionException - if there is a configuration error
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error reading the file

        Look up a registered method of any type. The currently supported types are builders and tasks.
        Parameters:
        name - The method name.
        Returns:
        The method implementation class, or null if it the method is not found.

      • getBuilderForType

        public <T> java.lang.Class<? extends org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.Builder> getBuilderForType(java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Get a command for a type. It consults registered commands and looks for the BuiltBy annotation.
        Parameters:
        type - A type that needs to be built.
        Returns:
        A command class to build type, or null if none can be found.
        See Also:
        registerCommand(java.lang.Class<T>, java.lang.Class<? extends org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.Builder>)

      • registerCommand

        public <T> void registerCommand(java.lang.Class<T> type,
                       java.lang.Class<? extends org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.Builder> command)
        Register a builder class for a type. Used to allow commands to be found for types where the type cannot be augmented with the BuiltBy annotation.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type to build (type parameter).
        Parameters:
        type - The type to build.
        command - A class that can build instances of type.
